title: Deepika Padukone lends her voice to Meta AI, actress says, 'Try it and let me know what you think!'

title: How artificial intelligence is transforming fast delivery into a customer retention engine
description: AI’s real power lies not only in logistics efficiency but also in building long-term relationships with customers. Their research shows that accurate delivery prediction and real-time transparency directly influence user trust, which in turn drives repeat purchases.
content: Artificial intelligence (AI) is reshaping the e-commerce battlefield, with speed, personalization, and reliability now emerging as the key to customer retention. A new study published in Frontiers in Artificial Intelligence presents a groundbreaking ... [6657 chars]

title: EXCLUSIVE-Anthropic aims to nearly triple annualized revenue in 2026, sources say
description: Artificial intelligence startup Anthropic is projecting to more than double and potentially nearly triple its annualized revenue run rate next year, fueled by the rapid adoption of its enterprise products, according to two people familiar with the matter. The company is on track to meet an internal goal of $9 billion in annual revenue run rate - a calculation of annual revenue extrapolated from the current sales pace - by the end of 2025, the people said.

title: US tech startup Anthropic unveils cheaper model to widen AI's appeal
description: Artificial intelligence startup Anthropic has overhauled its smallest AI model, Haiku, as companies increasingly opt for AI systems that are nearly as capable as the most advanced tools – but come at a fraction of the cost.
content:
Oct 15 (Reuters) - Artificial intelligence startup Anthropic has overhauled its smallest AI model, Haiku, as companies increasingly opt for AI systems that are nearly as capable as the most advanced tools – but come at a fraction of the cost.

title: Taking artificial intelligence to heart

title: Nvidia upgraded as HSBC sees AI driving nearly 80% upside
description: Nvidia Corp. added another bull on Wednesday, as HSBC upgraded the chipmaker to buy from hold, citing the ongoing growth of artificial intelligence.
content:
(Bloomberg/Ryan Vlastelica) — Nvidia Corp. added another bull on Wednesday, as HSBC upgraded the chipmaker to buy from hold, citing the ongoing growth of artificial intelligence.
